items.text_for_match: Earick rules out Spurs takeover bid after approach American tech entrepreneur Brooklyn Earick announces he will not make a formal takeover bid for Tottenham. American tech entrepreneur Brooklyn Earick announces he will not make a formal takeover bid for Tottenham.

items.ja: Arsenal consider Wembley move to enable Emirates Stadium expansion
items.en: Arsenal consider Wembley move to enable Emirates Stadium expansion
items.text_for_match: Arsenal consider Wembley move to enable Emirates Stadium expansion Arsenal hold internal discussions about expanding the capacity of Emirates Stadium, which currently sits just over 60,000. Arsenal hold internal discussions about expanding the capacity of Emirates Stadium, which currently sits just over 60,000.

items.ja: Arsenal reward keeper Raya with improved deal
items.en: Arsenal reward keeper Raya with improved deal
items.text_for_match: Arsenal reward keeper Raya with improved deal Arsenal reward goalkeeper David Raya with an improved contract to underline his status as one of Mikel Arteta's key players. Arsenal reward goalkeeper David Raya with an improved contract to underline his status as one of Mikel Arteta's key players.

items.ja: 'I deeply hurt people by moving to Saudi Arabia'
items.en: 'I deeply hurt people by moving to Saudi Arabia'
items.text_for_match: 'I deeply hurt people by moving to Saudi Arabia' In an interview with BBC Sport, Ashleigh Plumptre says she regrets losing the trust of some LGBT fans in women's football by moving to Saudi Arabia. In an interview with BBC Sport, Ashleigh Plumptre says she regrets losing the trust of some LGBT fans in women's football by moving to Saudi Arabia.

items.ja: The footballer who cycles to work after being inspired by Wenger
items.en: The footballer who cycles to work after being inspired by Wenger
items.text_for_match: The footballer who cycles to work after being inspired by Wenger Former Arsenal defender Hector Bellerin talks about his attempts to live a more sustainable life as he wins the BBC Green Sports Award. Former Arsenal defender Hector Bellerin talks about his attempts to live a more sustainable life as he wins the BBC Green Sports Award.
